title: Could taric get a buff to his mp5 or a mana cost reduction to his abilities?
body: Would help out quite a bit riot.

replies.body:
his abilities need lower mana cost plain and simple.
once you het 45% cdr its stupid how fast you go oom even with items such as {{item:3110}} (which is technically not a support item)
&
{{item:3107}}
something like after landing his second passive empowered auto his next spell has 30% cost reduc?
Yep would fit in well with the rest of his kit

Taric main here, and I would say this buff would be greatly appreciated. But I also want to say, Taric is honestly in a okish spot. Works best if someone on your team is let's say a {{champion:19}}  or a {{champion:120}}  or hell even a {{champion:103}}  To play Taric you need at leaste ONE diver on your team. And yes i'm putting ahri on that list for her ult is literally "i launch myself as a field nuke at people"

This way you ult them and they become unkillable DPs machines
I agree that he is in a decent enough spot I just find that the lack of mana sustain in lane forces you into being a stun bot rather than the battle healer
